versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Creates workshop structures, objectives, and participant preparation plans

schema.prompt:
Design a comprehensive workshop structure for the specified objectives:

Workshop Objectives: {{input.workshopObjectives}}
Participants: {{input.participants}}
Time Duration: {{input.timeDuration}}
Workshop Type: {{input.workshopType}}

Create complete workshop design:

1. Workshop Structure:
   - Opening and introductions
   - Agenda breakdown
   - Activity sequences
   - Break scheduling
   - Closing and next steps

2. Learning Objectives:
   - Knowledge transfer goals
   - Skill development targets
   - Behavior change outcomes
   - Collaboration objectives
   - Innovation deliverables

3. Activity Design:
   - Interactive exercises
   - Group discussions
   - Hands-on activities
   - Presentation segments
   - Reflection periods

4. Participant Engagement:
   - Icebreaker activities
   - Group formation strategies
   - Participation techniques
   - Energy management
   - Motivation maintenance

5. Material Requirements:
   - Pre-reading assignments
   - Workshop materials
   - Technology needs
   - Physical space setup
   - Supply requirements

6. Facilitation Guidelines:
   - Facilitator roles
   - Discussion management
   - Time management
   - Conflict resolution
   - Energy monitoring

7. Assessment Methods:
   - Learning checkpoints
   - Participation evaluation
   - Outcome measurement
   - Feedback collection
   - Follow-up planning

8. Workshop Logistics:
   - Room setup requirements
   - Technology specifications
   - Catering considerations
   - Transportation needs
   - Emergency procedures

Return as structured JSON with keys: workshopStructure (object), learningObjectives (array), activityDesign (array), engagementStrategy (object), materialRequirements (object), facilitationGuidelines (object), assessmentMethods (array), logisticsPlanning (object).

props.placeholder: What do you want to achieve with this workshop?
Who will attend? (roles, expertise, number of people)
How long is the workshop? (2 hours, full day, multi-day)
Training, brainstorming, problem-solving, team building, etc.

translations.description: Creates comprehensive workshop designs with structure, activities, and facilitation guidelines
translations.instructions: Enter your workshop objectives, participant information, and duration. The system will design a complete workshop with activities and facilitation guidance.
translations.name: Workshop Design
